name: Idle Isle: Late Night Snack
description:
"Idle Isle" is a 3D adventure game series with a  retro-future twist. "Idle Isle: Late Night Snack"  is the 1st of the series,  and is still in early development by  An Autumn Night's Dream Studio. 

"We're going back to the retro-future with Idle Isle, a hilarious 3D adventure."

  • WASD - MOVEMENT
  • SPACE - QUEST-LOG

Please leave critiques, insight, comments, and opinions!

Also, please check AAND studio out on social media!
